TITLE: Episode 144 - Scapegoats and Substitutionary Violence with David Gornoski
DESCRIPTION: This week, we are joined by David Gornoski of A Neighbor's Choice joins us to talk about human nature, mimetic theory, and the role of the scapegoat in society. Join us as we dig deep and hopefully learn something.
